snippet: William Burris and nine others paid thousands of dollars for franchises in a box rental business. When the Australian parent company collapsed, the franchisees faced some difficult choices.
abstract: Case Study column features challenges for franchisees of Rent Your Boxes, whose parent company declared bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: William Burris and nine others paid thousands of dollars for franchises in a box rental business. When the Australian parent company collapsed, the franchisees faced some difficult choices.

headline.seo: After the Parent Fails, a Franchisee Ponders His Next Steps
headline.main: Corporate Parent Lost, a Franchisee Starts Over
headline.print_headline: Corporate Parent Lost, A Franchisee Starts Over
